messages.content: How it is called when a teenager tries to act tuff but it is more cute like a wannebe

"Tweenage" or "preteenage" may be the closest terms to describe a teenager who is trying to act tough or mature but doesn't quite have the skills or maturity yet. These terms can also be used to refer to the behavior of teenagers who are trying to seem tough or mature, but are not always successful in doing so.
How it is called when a teenager tries to act tough but he is not scary at all like a wanne be tought guy

A teenager who tries to act tough but is not scary at all like a wannabe tough guy is sometimes referred to as a "wannabe tough guy". This term implies that the teenager is not very convincing in their attempts to appear tough, and is often seen as a weak or ineffectual individual.
